ruleBookInfo.author: [property$=author]@content
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
while(src.match(/文章不存在/)){
	Packages.java.lang.Thread.sleep(10)
	src=java.ajax(baseUrl)
	}
result
</js>
ruleBookInfo.name: [property$=book_name]@content

ruleContent.content:
<js>
while(src.match(/文章不存在/)){
	Packages.java.lang.Thread.sleep(10)
	src=java.ajax(baseUrl)
	}
result=java.getString("#htmlContent@html",src)
result
</js>##Ｘ更新最快
ruleContent.replaceRegex: ##第.*章.*\s*|\s*.*如章节缺失.*\s*|你看到的.*有缺失.*或者请使用其它.*\s*|.*喜欢看.*写的.*|，最快更新最新章节！|.*完整章节\)|[\(（]本章完[\)）].*

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
while(src.match(/文章不存在/)){
	Packages.java.lang.Thread.sleep(10)
	src=java.ajax(baseUrl)
	}
result
</js>
.col-md-3 a
ruleToc.chapterName: text##[\(（【].*?[求更票谢乐发订合补加Kk].*?[】）\)]

searchUrl:
<js>
  u=source.getKey().match(/([^\#]+)\#/)[1];
  cookie.removeCookie(u);
	hm=java.get(u,{});	cs=decodeURIComponent(String(hm.header("Set-Cookie")).replace(/[eE]xpires[^;]+;|[pP]ath=\/;|,|httponly|\s/g,'').replace(/^;|;$/g,''));	token=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(hm.body()).select('input[name="_token"]').attr('value');
s=page>1?'&page='+page:'';	body="_token="+token+"&kw="+key+s;
	head={"cookie":cs}
	post={
		"method": "POST",
		"body":body,
		"headers":head
	}
u+"/search/,"+JSON.stringify(post)
</js>
